overview:
Tim works with the world’s elite brands to create unique and deeply engaging email marketing campaigns. With more than a decade of digital media experience, he leads Movable Ink’s sales and business development teams in his role as CRO.

Prior to joining Movable Ink, Tim was senior vice president and a general manager at Triad Retail Media. Before Triad, he held sales management positions at Time Inc.’s TIME.com and LIFE.com divisions, A&E Television Networks, and The New York Times. Tim graduated with a BA in English from Syracuse University.
